abstract: News analysis; suicide car bomb attack in Kabul, Afghanistan, that killed 13 foreigners and at least 4 Afghans, appears to be message from the Pakistan-based Haqqani faction of the Taliban that they are willing and able to kill foreign troops.
snippet: The Haqqani network is telling the world and, especially, the Afghan public, that it is willing and able to kill foreign troops.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The Haqqani network is telling the world and, especially, the Afghan public, that it is willing and able to kill foreign troops.

headline.main: Attacks on Foreigners in Capital Get Afghan Faction’s Message Across
headline.print_headline: Attacks on Foreigners in Capital Get Afghan Faction’s Message Across
headline.seo: Haqqani Network Sends Message With Kabul Attacks
